review: In the beginning I never saw what the big deal was when it came to these streaming devices, since I had always used my video consoles at home. I only purchased it on a store credit card that I never use in order to keep the card before they cancelled it.  I love this device!  I have satellite television with all the channels and sometimes there is still nothing on tv.  With FIRE there is always something on.  I can listen to music, watch television shows, or movies.  I can catch up on shows I missed yesterday or years ago.  I have even come across current movies offered cheaper to rent than other rental boxes.  The voice command isn't too bad either.  The only problem I have is making myself go to bed.

author: Amazon Customer

review: This streaming box is great!  As a prime customer i am able to  take advantage of all streaming options. Countless numbers of movies, shows, and games are available.  The box loads fast from one app to another, from one show or movie to another, or one game to another.  I have no issue connecting to my wireless network (ac). The fact that it allows for out of market android programming is nice if you are into that sort of thing. The remote is small and i always lose it, so maybe some kind of locator could be built or something.  I don't like the UI much. I have a Roku 3 and the UI is very plain and easy to use.  The Fire Tv is okay but the point i suppose is to take advantage of Amazon services.  Point well taken.  All that said i would recommend anyone buy it especially if you have a Prime membership.
